name: Star Hawx
overview: The evil Star Hawx threaten to take over the Galaxy. Earth has had enough and has decided to fight back. You control a space fighter, which has to do battle against all of the Star Hawx. Use left/right to move your ship and fire to blast lasers at those deadly birds.The Space Hawx will attempt to avenge and attack against your fighter. As soon as all of the Star Hawx have been shot dead, you will be awarded a bonus of 1000 points and move onto the next level, where the game gets harder. At any time during play, use down to protect yourself via a shield. Once the shield is gone, it is gone. Shoot green eggs to be awarded a shield and a mystery bonus. Can you complete all 16 levels battling against the evil Star Hawx? Good luck pilot.
